UPDATE 6 January:

The following are available to Trade for PSA HOFers that are Centered and Nice-for-Grade.
1952 Bowman Mantle PSA-4 TRADED;

1953 Bowman Mantle PSA-5 TRADED; and

1958 Topps Maris RC PSA-8. (new to list)


Please reply to [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Steve
